content.query:
DROP EXTERNAL FILE FORMAT [SynapseParquetFormat] 
GO

IF NOT EXISTS (SELECT * FROM sys.external_file_formats WHERE name = 'SynapseParquetFormat') 
	CREATE EXTERNAL FILE FORMAT [SynapseParquetFormat] 
	WITH ( FORMAT_TYPE = PARQUET)
GO

DROP EXTERNAL DATA SOURCE [synapse_adlrjzs_dfs_core_windows_net] 
GO

IF NOT EXISTS (SELECT * FROM sys.external_data_sources WHERE name = 'synapse_adlrjzs_dfs_core_windows_net') 
	CREATE EXTERNAL DATA SOURCE [synapse_adlrjzs_dfs_core_windows_net] 
	WITH (
		LOCATION = 'abfss://synapse@adlrjzs.dfs.core.windows.net' 
	)
GO

DROP EXTERNAL TABLE chicago
GO

CREATE EXTERNAL TABLE chicago (
	[dataType] nvarchar(4000),
	[dataSubtype] nvarchar(4000),
	[dateTime] datetime2(7),
	[category] nvarchar(4000),
	[subcategory] nvarchar(4000),
	[status] nvarchar(4000),
	[address] nvarchar(4000),
	[latitude] float,
	[longitude] float,
	[source] nvarchar(4000),
	[extendedProperties] nvarchar(4000)
	)
	WITH (
	LOCATION = 'raw/sample/chicago/part-00000-tid-6745340990285432122-cef40199-6d1e-4bf4-b55d-9b20963bcbc3-16621-2.c000.snappy_00000.parquet',
	DATA_SOURCE = [synapse_adlrjzs_dfs_core_windows_net],
	FILE_FORMAT = [SynapseParquetFormat]
	)
GO


SELECT TOP 100 * FROM dbo.chicago
GO
